meaningMnemonic: You're so <kanji>adept</kanji>! That makes you <vocabulary>adept</vocabulary> at that thing. <vocabulary>Skillful</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>clever</vocabulary> are other ways to do it too.
readingMnemonic: Remember 旨い, which means "delicious"? Remember how it also means "skillful" and "clever"? It's the same with this word, and the reading is the same as well.
